structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Consolidated local government to prescribe conditions for use of streets by board.
law.text: The legislative body of the consolidated local government may, by ordinance, fix reasonable conditions upon which the board of waterworks may cut into the public ways of the consolidated local government.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 112, effective July 15, 2002. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3024a-7.
